original_text: Do not give special things that are for God to dogs. The dogs will turn round and attack you. Do not throw valuable things to pigs. The pigs will only stand on them and bury them in the dirt.’
korean_text: 거룩한 것을 개에게 주지 말며 너희 진주를 돼지 앞에 던지지 말라 그들이 그것을 발로 밟고 돌이켜 너희를 찢어 상하게 할까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: Do not give special things that are for God to dogs.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께 드릴 특별한 것들을 개들에게 주지 마라.

sentences.original_text: The dogs will turn round and attack you.
Do not throw valuable things to pigs.
The pigs will only stand on them and bury them in the dirt.
sentences.korean_translation: 돼지들은 그 위에 서서 그것들을 흙에 묻어버릴 것이다.
